title: Pathfinder - Inner Sea Bestiary [Pdf Eng]
description:

Some, like the gearsmen of Numeria or the moth-like star monarchs who serve the goddess of dreams, have been mentioned many times in Pathfinder Campaign Setting books, but others, like the alien vespergaunt or RahadoumÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s desert-dwelling whirlmaws, have only been obliquely illustrated or mentioned before. And someÃ¢â‚¬â€like the mysterious and ancient veiled masters, and the disturbingly alluring fungus queenÃ¢â‚¬â€make their appearance for the first time in print after debuting in PaizoÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s office campaigns.

The Inner Sea Bestiary explores some of GolarionÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s most unique monsters. Inside this book you will find:
